operators.title: Hello Africa
info: Lower speeds should be expected in Botswana, Central African Republic, Guinea Republic, Liberia, Namibia, Nigeria, and Swaziland.

packages.title: 3 GB - 30 Days
packages.qr_installation:
eSIM name: Hello Africa

Coverage: Algeria, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, Congo, Cote D'Ivoire, Democractic Republic of the Congo, Gabon, Ghana, Guinea Republic, Guinea-Bissau, Kenya, Liberia, Madagascar, Malawi, Namibia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Senegal, Sierra Leone, South, Africa, Swaziland, Tanzania, Tunisia, Uganda, Zambia.

To activate the eSIM by scanning the QR code on your eSIM capable device you need to print or display this QR code on another device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Scan QR code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Enable data roaming.

To top-up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.
packages.manual_installation:
eSIM name: Hello Africa

Coverage: Algeria, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, Congo, Cote D'Ivoire, Democractic Republic of the Congo, Gabon, Ghana, Guinea Republic, Guinea-Bissau, Kenya, Liberia, Madagascar, Malawi, Namibia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Senegal, Sierra Leone, South, Africa, Swaziland, Tanzania, Tunisia, Uganda, Zambia.

To manually activate the eSIM on your eSIM capable device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Manually enter the SM-DP+ Address and activation code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Enable data roaming.

To top-up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.

operators.title: Island Hopper
info: Lower speed is expected in Montserrat.

packages.title: 1 GB - 7 Days
packages.short_info: This eSIM doesn't come with a phone number.
packages.qr_installation:
eSIM name: Island Hopper

Coverage: Anguilla, Antigua & Barbuda, Aruba, Barbados, Bahamas, Bonaire, British Virgin Islands, Cayman Islands, Curaçao, Dominica, Grenada, Guadeloupe, Haiti, Jamaica, Martinique, Montserrat, Panama, Puerto Rico, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and Grenadines, Trinidad and Tobago, Turks and Caicos Islands.

To activate the eSIM by scanning the QR code on your eSIM capable device you need to print or display this QR code on other device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Scan QR code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Locate the APN settings in your settings menu.
  2. Update the APN to "airalo1".
  3. Enable data roaming.

To top up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.

packages.title: 1 GB - 7 Days
packages.short_info: This eSIM doesn't come with a phone number.
packages.qr_installation:
eSIM name: Discover Global

Coverage:  Aland Islands, Albania, Argentina, Armenia, Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Belgium, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Brazil, Bulgaria, Cambodia, Canada, Chile, China, Colombia, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Estonia, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Ghana, Gibraltar, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Iraq, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Jersey, Kazakhstan, Kosovo, Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macau, Macedonia, Malaysia, Malta, Mexico, Moldova, Montenegro, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Tajikistan, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States, US Virgin Islands, Vietnam.

To activate the eSIM by scanning the QR code on your eSIM capable device you need to print or display this QR code on other device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Scan QR code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data in the following countries:

Argentina, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Puerto Rico, United States, US Virgin Islands

  1. Locate the APN settings in your settings menu.
  2. Update the APN to "tn1".
  3. Enable data roaming.

To access Data in other countries:

  1. Locate the APN settings in your settings menu.
  2. Update the APN to "rh" or "globaldata".
  3. Enable data roaming.

To top up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.
